name: Alchemy Classic
description: Love puzzles? Create animals, dinosaurs, machines and much more solving challenging puzzles! Creating Elements - Create the World! Amazing discoveries await you...
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Wndows 7 32-bit or higher Процессор: Intel Core 2 Duo / AMD Atholon Dual-Core or better Оперативная память: 2 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: Intel HD2000 or better Место на диске: 500 MB
